description: Great! Don't need any registration! Furthemore you can play music from youtube without any adds ;-)
I needed some music playing in the background to soothe an upset dog, installed this and searched for soothing tracks. Brilliant. Dog now fast asleep.

The feature set on this app is amazing. If you like queuing up some tunes and kicking back for autoplay this is great. The interface is easy to use. Back when I started using Linux most of the audio apps sucked. This is the type of app that Windows or Mac users would feel comfortable with. Great job!
The sound quality is just perfect

This app is for you if you are looking for a platform all kinds of audio.

act as a server on your behalf. all your downloaded songs are stored within this program. all your dnldd songs are then served up via you acting as server.
i never used any music player that can come close to this. just awesome

I am a non spootify heavy soundcloud user music junkie. This is more then perfect for me. At first i was sceptic around soundquality etc... Olivia actually sounds better then my regular sc. Thank you!
Whether you listen to soundcloud, Youtube, or internet radio. Olivia is the best app. It removes ads and lets you focus on the music
summary: best streaming music app for ubuntu

description: all the music in one app...
summary: Nice. Great choice for music lovers

description: I don't do 5 stars. Ever. But all things considered, I had to give it 5. Definitely has the best EQ of any media player I am aware of on Linux, and I think I've used them all. Can't say I agree with every single word of the developer's write-up, but it is a solid player/downloader with pretty regular updates. The UI takes a few minutes to get used to, but it is my desktop daily driver now and it's going to take a hell of a lot to move it off that perch. Note to Dev: Would be fantastic if the downloaded files kept their original names
summary: Arguably the best sound quality on Linux

description: Really useful app

It streams music. And its stable. Period.
BUT. The UI is just straight up ugly. The entrie window just looks congested with about 3 or 4 sections (cant even hide any). I have no idea why a music straming app needs this much complexity in the UI. It just need a search bar and track listing.

I think the UI is great! It's not some dumbed down, minimalist interface. It actually presents plenty of information in a neat, easy to use manner. To me, it's intuitive.
Unsure how long it's been around but, a few more streaming services would be nice. That being said, it's got a few important ones that actually work!

Olivia must be the only music streaming app where I can get almost all songs I liked, whether it be popular or not. Downloading is easy and you get full customization theme. No ads and you can listen to Youtube videos into audio only directly. I think I will be using this as my primary music streaming app for a while.

description:
i love this little gem, it's a must-have for music folks who like to geek out. effectively it combines the best of spotify, youtube music,, etc ... into one integrated experience for both audio and video. but mostly audio.
bit of a learning curve UI-wise. but that's part of the fun as well.
Just perfect! I haven't really tried the smart list feature, but for playing a song or a specific album is just perfect!
I never thought this kind of app available on ubuntu.Its a wonderful app.
best music player
I like Olivia because it handles all of my youtube downloads quite well.
Best player/ripper on Linux. Tiny bit buggy herew and there, but overall the nest there is. Powerful EQ as well...oine of the ytruly better ones
Super!Super!Super!

I started using it, and it does let me listen to music. I can even download tracks for offline listening! Not full-featured yet, though. I'm only using the BETA version. I'd like a full version soon, even though it might be subscription-based later. However, it would be nice if there was a free version of it. The reason I'm giving it four stars is because it's not full-featured yet.
Works like a charm
more setting are little tricky

I have been using this for a few weeks and I love it, I do hope this stays free instead of pay-walling, I think you should add a button for donations though because I would chip in a few bucks here and there for this.

Olivia works perfectly, you can play music from about everywhere Youtube, SoundCloud etc and you can even download audio which is great and you can create playlists and queues , beautiful interface and design is stunning , I love the customisation and everything works well. 10/10 review best music app, even better than Spotify and FREE too ;)
summary: Awesome and works perfectly, Excellent App!

description:
Main issues:
- Sound quality isn't as good as streaming direct from youtube. maybe just prioritise best quality videos and audio only.

- The Olivia library content is often NOT artists official release content, but alt studio/fair use versions etc, obviously, but would have been nice to mention. unless i missed it.

I agree with the other comments, this is pretty awesome.

(For those users who can't cant get it to work try adjusting your permissions settings) 

imo:
- EQ is kinda pointless until general quality is better. When it is, include some presets. Maybe put super EQ in a 'studio/pro' version available separately?
- Colour theme options are also kinda pointless. Just have a few light/dark presets.
summary: 100% worth a look..... just remember its a beta

description: Impressive how well you can browse music on youtube and put it into playlists!
It has many functions but not confusing. You don't need to configure to figure out what to do with it. With a few clicks it works pretty well.
summary: The app is quite nice and intuitive, easy to use

Läuft soweit sehr gut. Die Bedienung mit Smartlists ist am Anfang gewöhnungsbedürftig, wenn man Spotify gewohnt ist. Aber eigentlich ein mächtiges Konzept. 
Negativ: das Anlegen von playlists funktioniert wohl noch nicht (oder ich mache was falsch). 
Wenn das Projekt langfristig supported wird, werde ich überlegen, meine Spotify-Beiträge teilweise an die Olivia-Macher zu spenden statt an Spotify.

Riesen Auswahl an Songs und die Möglichkeit Musik zu Downloaden als mp3.

nice auf Anhieb gut

Spyware? Virus? Maleware? Hmmm? Die Spyware deinstalliert und gut is... such ich mir einen anderen player... weil vlc... nur weil er nix anzeigt bedeutet nicht das er es nicht tut... vorallem, wenn der pc im Idle Modus läuft und vlc an ist... ;) you know

description: Un logiciel que je ne connaissais pas et dont j'ai été agréablement surpris des différentes fonctionnalitées, possibilité d'écouter des titres musicaux de youtube et de pouvoir les enregistrer et d'en hfaire une playlist, écouter les radios internet du monde, avec une recherche par pays, langue, artistes ou par genre, inclus un top list par pays et de connaitre les titres les plus écoutés dans chaques pays. Inclus aussi la plateforme soundcloud. Seul regret c'est qu'il ne soit pas proposer par défaut dans Ubuntu au lieu de Rhythmbox qui n'est plus mise à jour depuis des années.
Magnifique, mais complexe, on dirait des possibilités illimitées.
Fonctionne très bien sous Ubuntu 18.04. Beaucoup d'options. Bien meilleur que R****box ou O*io, plus légers mais limités. Permet l'enregistrement depuis Y**tube. Pourvu que ça dure !
complet et assez geek, bravo !
assez complete
prise en main facile et enormement de functions
incroyable, on trouve tous ce qui est musicale, vraiment belle platforme
